controls.name: control_80b28700-b62a-11ef-839f-cd939c662428
controls.label: Create Multi Level Work Order Via Production Method
controls.customCode:
<b-spinner variant="primary" v-if="$getGlobalModel('creatingWorkOrderFromPart')" />

<b-button 
v-else
variant="primary"
@click='createMultiLevelWorkOrderFromProductionMethod(rowData)'

>
    Create Work Order From Production Method
</b-button>

controls.name: control_25681d20-b3a5-11ee-819e-6bf5f66f2f4b
controls.label: Create Work Order From Estimate
controls.customCode:
<b-spinner variant="primary" v-if="$getGlobalModel('creatingWorkOrderFromEstimate')" />

<b-button 
v-else
variant="success"
@click='createWorkOrderFromEstimate(rowData)'

>
    Create Work Order From Estimate
</b-button>

controls.name: control_6330d100-b62a-11ef-839f-cd939c662428
controls.label: Create Multi Level Work Order From Part
controls.customCode:
<b-spinner variant="primary" v-if="$getGlobalModel('creatingWorkOrderFromPart')" />
<b-button
v-else
variant="primary"
@click='createMultiLevelWorkOrderFromPart(rowData)'
>
    Create Work Order From Part
</b-button>

controls.name: control_c03dd430-b3a4-11ee-819e-6bf5f66f2f4b
controls.label: Create Work Order
controls.customCode:
<b-spinner variant="primary" v-if="$getGlobalModel('creatingWorkOrder')" />

<b-button 
v-else
variant="primary"
@click='createWorkOrderFromProductionMethod(rowData, rowData.$salesOrder)'

>
    Create Work Order From Production Method
</b-button>

controls.name: control_14bcb600-c455-11ee-854f-152f2c78e202
controls.label: Create Work Order From Part
controls.customCode:
<b-spinner variant="primary" v-if="$getGlobalModel('creatingWorkOrderFromPart')" />

<b-button 
v-else
variant="primary"
@click='createWorkOrderFromPart(rowData)'

>
    Create Work Order From Part
</b-button>
